useUnnoticed.name: Unnoticed
useUnnoticed.hint: Use 'Unnoticed' rather than 'Undetected' when the stealth initiative check beats the target's perception DC and initiative

removeGmHidden.name: Reveal combatant tokens at Combat Start
removeGmHidden.hint: Combatant tokens with disabled visibility will be revealed at combat start, allowing perception/stealth results to behave as expected

requireActivity.name: Require 'Avoid Notice' exploration activity
requireActivity.hint: PCs are required to set the 'Avoid Notice' exploration activity active to hide at combat start. If disabled, PCs instead need to use stealth for initiative.

conditionHandler.name: Condition Handler
conditionHandler.hint: Worst dc visually favors the sneakers, whereas best dc visually favors the seekers.
conditionHandler.best: Use the worst degree-of-success determine the condition
conditionHandler.worst: Use the best degree-of-success to determine the condition
conditionHandler.perception: Let the pf2e-perception module handle it
conditionHandler.perceptive: Let the Perceptive module handle it

computeCover.name: Compute Cover at Combat Start
computeCover.hint: Use 'PF2e Perception' to automatically compute cover between tokens using stealth for initiative and non-allied Tokens. It is only used for this check, and will not utilize greater cover

schema.name: Schema Version
schema.hint: Set this to a previous version to force a data migration from the specified version to the current version

pf2e-avoid-notice.nonHider: Needs to use Avoid Notice exploration activity if wanting to hide at combat start
